active_learning.discussion_prompt: In the context of high-profile supply chain attacks like SolarWinds (2020) and XZ Utils (2024), discuss how failures in distribution channel verification enabled compromise. What role does provenance tracking play, and how can organizations balance cost with security in choosing channels? Debate the trade-offs between authorized distributors and gray markets.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
